languages.text: Камень испещрен сколами — рядом взорвался снаряд болтера.
The rock is pitted all over — a bolter shell exploded nearby.
languages.original_text: Камень испещрен сколами — рядом взорвался снаряд болтера.

traits.locale_text: The rock is pitted all over — a bolter shell exploded nearby.
The rock is pitted all over — a bolter shell exploded nearby.
The rock is pitted all over — a bolter shell exploded nearby.
The rock is pitted all over — a bolter shell exploded nearby.

languages.text: 岩石上到处都是凹坑，应该是爆矢枪的爆矢在附近爆炸了。
languages.original_text: The rock is pitted all over — a bolter shell exploded nearby.

traits.locale_text: 岩石上到处都是凹坑，应该是爆矢枪的爆矢在附近爆炸了。

languages.text: 岩はあちこちへこんでいる。近くでボルター・シェルが爆発したのだろう。
languages.original_text: The rock is pitted all over — a bolter shell exploded nearby.

traits.locale_text: 岩はあちこちへこんでいる。近くでボルター・シェルが爆発したのだろう。

languages.text: La roca está hecha añicos por la explosión de un proyectil de bólter cercano.
languages.original_text: The rock is pitted all over — a bolter shell exploded nearby.

traits.locale_text: La roca está hecha añicos por la explosión de un proyectil de bólter cercano.

languages.text: Le rocher est criblé d'impacts provenant probablement d'une cartouche de bolter qui a explosé à proximité.
languages.original_text: The rock is pitted all over — a bolter shell exploded nearby.

traits.locale_text: Le rocher est criblé d'impacts provenant probablement d'une cartouche de bolter qui a explosé à proximité.

languages.text: Der Fels weist deutliche Spuren einer Bolter-Explosion in der Nähe auf.
languages.original_text: The rock is pitted all over — a bolter shell exploded nearby.

traits.locale_text: Der Fels weist deutliche Spuren einer Bolter-Explosion in der Nähe auf.

languages.text: Yakında patlayan bulonatar mermisi yüzünden taşın her yeri oyulmuş.
languages.original_text: The rock is pitted all over — a bolter shell exploded nearby.

traits.locale_text: Yakında patlayan bulonatar mermisi yüzünden taşın her yeri oyulmuş.
